response.original_title: In a Nutshell: A Portrait of Elizabeth Tashjian
response.overview: Some three years in the making, In a Nutshell is a documentary on Elizabeth Yegsa Tashjian -- a one-time concert violinist, heralded artist, Christian Science healer, late TV celebrity and founder of the Nut Museum in Old Lyme, Connecticut. In her 90s, she became a ward of the state and confined to a nursing home against her will. This feature-length film focuses on her fight to preserve her identity and regain her life.
response.title: In a Nutshell: A Portrait of Elizabeth Tashjian
